p: The Ames test for different test preparations (Ethyl acetate extract: 30.5 mg/mL; Flavonoids: 54.75 mg/mL; Cardiac glycosides: 59.5 mg/mL) was carried out by plate incorporation method, as described earlier [ 21] (for details see Additional file 1). Sodium azide was taken as a standard mutagen, while 30% DMSO were used as a negative control.
